Documentation: github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/types 

     1  package types
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"bytes"
     5  	"encoding/xml"
     6  	"errors"
     7  	"fmt"
     8  	"io"
     9  	"net/http"
    10  )
    11  
    12  const unknownErr = "unknown error"
    13  
    14  var (
    15  	ErrorDefaultAccountNotExist = errors.New("Default account of client is not exist ")
    16  	ErrorProposalIDNotFound     = errors.New("Proposal ID not found ")
    17  )
    18  
    19  // ErrResponse define the information of the error response
    20  type ErrResponse struct {
    21  	XMLName    xml.Name `xml:"Error"`
    22  	Code       string   `xml:"Code"`
    23  	Message    string   `xml:"Message"`
    24  	RequestId  string   `xml:"RequestId"`
    25  	StatusCode int
    26  }
    27  
    28  // Error returns the error msg
    29  func (r ErrResponse) Error() string {
    30  	return fmt.Sprintf("statusCode %v : code : %s  request-id %s (Message: %s)",
    31  		r.StatusCode, r.Code, r.RequestId, r.Message)
    32  }
    33  
    34  // ConstructErrResponse  checks the response is an error response
    35  func ConstructErrResponse(r *http.Response, bucketName, objectName string) error {
    36  	if c := r.StatusCode; 200 <= c && c <= 299 {
    37  		return nil
    38  	}
    39  
    40  	if r == nil {
    41  		return ErrResponse{
    42  			StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    43  			Code:       unknownErr,
    44  			Message:    "Response is empty ",
    45  			RequestId:  "greenfield",
    46  		}
    47  	}
    48  
    49  	errResp := ErrResponse{}
    50  	errResp.StatusCode = r.StatusCode
    51  
    52  	// read err body of max 10M size
    53  	const maxBodySize = 10 * 1024 * 1024
    54  	body, err := io.ReadAll(io.LimitReader(r.Body, maxBodySize))
    55  	if err != nil {
    56  		return ErrResponse{
    57  			StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    58  			Code:       "InternalError",
    59  			Message:    err.Error(),
    60  		}
    61  	}
    62  	// decode the xml content from response body
    63  	decodeErr := xml.NewDecoder(bytes.NewReader(body)).Decode(&errResp)
    64  	if decodeErr != nil {
    65  		switch r.StatusCode {
    66  		case http.StatusNotFound:
    67  			if bucketName != "" {
    68  				if objectName == "" {
    69  					errResp = ErrResponse{
    70  						StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    71  						Code:       "NoSuchBucket",
    72  						Message:    "The specified bucket does not exist.",
    73  					}
    74  				} else {
    75  					errResp = ErrResponse{
    76  						StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    77  						Code:       "NoSuchObject",
    78  						Message:    "The specified object does not exist.",
    79  					}
    80  				}
    81  			}
    82  		case http.StatusForbidden:
    83  			errResp = ErrResponse{
    84  				StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    85  				Code:       "AccessDenied",
    86  				Message:    "no permission to access the resource",
    87  			}
    88  		default:
    89  			errBody := bytes.TrimSpace(body)
    90  			msg := unknownErr
    91  			if len(errBody) > 0 {
    92  				msg = string(errBody)
    93  			}
    94  			fmt.Println("default error msg :", msg)
    95  			errResp = ErrResponse{
    96  				StatusCode: r.StatusCode,
    97  				Code:       unknownErr,
    98  				Message:    msg,
    99  			}
   100  		}
   101  	}
   102  
   103  	return errResp
   104  }
   105  
   106  // ToInvalidArgumentResp returns invalid argument response.
   107  func ToInvalidArgumentResp(message string) error {
   108  	return ErrResponse{
   109  		StatusCode: http.StatusBadRequest,
   110  		Code:       "InvalidArgument",
   111  		Message:    message,
   112  		RequestId:  "greenfield",
   113  	}
   114  }
   115
